verbs.description: i [V: have] been beaten my skull fractured for right to vote i have been beaten my skull fractured and arrested more than forty times so that each and every person has the right to register and vote he said john lewis us politician georgia rep john lewis j scott applewhite washington dr martin luther king jr rep john lewis
